title: Ticket #2126: startd cron args fail
description:
If ARGS are specified for a startd cron job, the cron job fails to be initialized and so does not run. The error message in the startd log indicates that the arguments are being parsed as an environment specification rather than as arguments.

If ENV is specified, it is ignored.
remarks:
2011-May-10 14:58:37 by tannenba:
Nick code reviewed this patch, looked good, pushed.
check_ins: 2011-May-04 21:39   Check-in [21787]: Fixed startd cron bug handling ARGS. ===GT=== #2126 ===VersionHistory=== Fixed a bug introduced in 7.5.6 that caused any startd cron job with non-empty ARGS to fail. Also, the ENV specified for startd cron jobs was ignored. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
